detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdrawBalance() (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#15-22):
	External calls:
	- ! (msg.sender.call.value(userBalance[msg.sender])()) (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#18)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalance[msg.sender] = 0 (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#21)
	Reentrance.userBalance (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#5) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Reentrance.addToBalance() (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#11-13)
	- Reentrance.getBalance(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#7-9)
	- Reentrance.withdrawBalance() (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#15-22)
	- Reentrance.withdrawBalance_fixed() (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#24-32)
	- Reentrance.withdrawBalance_fixed_2() (Preprocessed_Contracts/reentrancy.sol#34-41)
